channel.title: Why the hell is Win7 so fucking retarded?
channel.description:
Alright, few problems here. I've had win7 for a while now (3-4 months now)
and I've noticed a SHIT ton of problems with it.
1) When I'm idle, my computer will lock (I didn't even set this fucking option.) I have NO idea how to change this.
2) When my computer locks up, I come back, notice that my tower light is flashing (means its locked, or hibrinating or some shit) I login, and EVERYTIME I fucking login my soundcard will just not work, its just like it'll uninstall until I reboot. (inb4 "REBOOT, DOIT FAGGOT." Go to #3) The speakers Icon will just have a O and a line through it, just as if it were muted, but when I double click on it, it says "Microsoft is trying to detect the problem". When it finally finishes, it says "Your hardware is not responding."
3) Now I think this is just my hardware, but when I start up my computer, it'll fucking stay at the manufacturers logo, (compaq) which is the reason why I NEVER turn off my computer. And why this fucking soundcard thing pisses me off so much. Yeah, it'll stay there for about 20-30 minutes. I've spoken to Lin about this, and he said it was my battery. I opened up my computer and checked it, it's fine.
Anyway, if you got a solution to any of these problems, please post. And yes, I've tried googling. Nothing came up.
P.s. Yes, I do use Linux, but barely ever boot into it (I play games a lot etc)

item.title: Why the hell is Win7 so fucking retarded?
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“r0ckstar96, post:23, topic:314495”]Oh and to add on to my sentence: AND it’s an eMachines!

Maybe because your computer is too old to run the latest OS…

2 years…

Mine is too, and I don’t experience much problems with it, and it’s a vista.

wow i’ve had my PC for just under a year and it’s fucked…

Well what’s your computer brand? Dell, eMachines, etc.?[/quote]

Acer.

Read full topic

item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“r0ckstar96, post:17, topic:314495”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=410971.msg3031218#msg3031218 date=1258405798]
Alright, few problems here. I’ve had win7 for a while now (3-4 months now)

and I’ve noticed a SHIT ton of problems with it.

  1. When I’m idle, my computer will lock (I didn’t even set this fucking option.)
    I have NO idea how to change this.

  2. When my computer locks up, I come back, notice that my tower light is flashing (means its locked, or hibrinating or some shit) I login, and EVERYTIME I fucking login my soundcard will just not work, its just like it’ll uninstall until I reboot. (inb4 “REBOOT, DOIT FAGGOT.” Go to #3)
    The speakers Icon will just have a O and a line through it, just as if it were muted, but when I double click on it, it says “Microsoft is trying to detect the problem”. When it finally finishes, it says “Your hardware is not responding.”

  3. Now I think this is just my hardware, but when I start up my computer, it’ll fucking stay at the manufacturers logo, (compaq) which is the reason why I NEVER turn off my computer.
    [/quote]

  1. Can’t you edit your settings in the control panel? Or is Windows 7 nothing like Vista?

  2. Don’t by compaqs or eMachines[/quote]
    cool perfect solution

  3. my computer is gay
    A: THEN DONT BUY GAY COMPUTERS

tnx 4 gd ansr now i kan sleep @ nite etc

    The speakers Icon will just have a O and a line through it, just as if it were muted, but when I double click on it, it says “Microsoft is trying to detect the problem”. When it finally finishes, it says “Your hardware is not responding.”

item.title: Why the hell is Win7 so fucking retarded?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:1, topic:314495"]I’ve spoken to Lin about this, and he said it was my battery. I opened up my computer and checked it, it’s fine.[/quote]I never said that… I said your drivers may be fucked, but that sounds unlikely since the sound card works fine.

As for the real battery part, you said your computer froze on the manufacturer’s logo, although you NOW say it gets somewhere. By batteries, I meant these little battery-like things on your motherboard that slowly explode one-by-one, and eventually your computer will just get locked on that screen. It’s happened to me.

Read full topic

item.source: Why the hell is Win7 so fucking retarded?

item.title: Why the hell is Win7 so fucking retarded?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:6, topic:314495”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=410971.msg3031273#msg3031273 date=1258407239]
Switch back to XP! windows 7 is an upgrade or vista nothing else, they use the same resources, then look kind of similar all they are doing is making it look better, but its not better.

XP was the best they ever had, they should stick with it.
[/quote]

No. 1000x No.
The remade the back end shit of win7 cause vista sucked so badly. The only thing they kept was the look and feel.

@OP: I’ve had win7 for a few months now, never had the problem you have. My PC doesn’t lock when I go idle, and I’ve never had any problems with it.
Try updating the soundcard drivers, and if that doesn’t work, it may be your hardware.
What is your PC’s specs?[/quote]
Amd Athlon 64 processor 3500+ 2.2GHz, 1GB of RAM
Windows 7 Ultimate x86 (32bit)
NVIDIA GeForce 8400 GS

Also, updating my soundcard’s drivers didn’t seem to do anything. (I tested by going Idle etc)

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:7, topic:314495”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=410971.msg3031224#msg3031224 date=1258406181]
My hard disk failed a week after installing it. I’m not sure if this the cause, but I’m suspicious that it has something to do with 7.
[/quote]
Same. It just kept turning off after a few minutes of being on, got it fixed though.[/quote]
Is that when the screen just turns off and after a few seconds, a quick blue screen will show up… (Not BSOD)
Then just reboots?
I got that a few times (3-4)

Read full topic

item.title: Why the hell is Win7 so fucking retarded?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Alright, few problems here. I’ve had win7 for a while now (3-4 months now)

and I’ve noticed a SHIT ton of problems with it.

  1. When I’m idle, my computer will lock (I didn’t even set this fucking option.)
    I have NO idea how to change this.

  2. When my computer locks up, I come back, notice that my tower light is flashing (means its locked, or hibrinating or some shit) I login, and EVERYTIME I fucking login my soundcard will just not work, its just like it’ll uninstall until I reboot. (inb4 “REBOOT, DOIT FAGGOT.” Go to #3)
    The speakers Icon will just have a O and a line through it, just as if it were muted, but when I double click on it, it says “Microsoft is trying to detect the problem”. When it finally finishes, it says “Your hardware is not responding.”

  3. Now I think this is just my hardware, but when I start up my computer, it’ll fucking stay at the manufacturers logo, (compaq) which is the reason why I NEVER turn off my computer. And why this fucking soundcard thing pisses me off so much. Yeah, it’ll stay there for about 20-30 minutes. I’ve spoken to Lin about this, and he said it was my battery. I opened up my computer and checked it, it’s fine.

Anyway, if you got a solution to any of these problems, please post.
And yes, I’ve tried googling. Nothing came up.

P.s. Yes, I do use Linux, but barely ever boot into it (I play games a lot etc)

Read full topic
item.source: Why the hell is Win7 so fucking retarded?
